content: तरस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तॄ-करणादौ असुन्] <ab>Ved.</ab> Quick, energetic. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Speed, velocity. {@--2@} Vigour, strength, energy; कैलासनाथं तरसा जिगीषुः <ls>R. 5. 28</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 77</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 72.</ls> {@--3@} A bank, a place of crossing. {@--4@} A float, raft. {@--5@} A monkey. {@--6@} A disease.
